rationale: This species has a wide distribution within the Congo, with no known major widespread threats. It is therefore listed as Least Concern. It has also been assessed regionally as Least Concern for central Africa. More information on the distribution and threats to this species in eastern Africa is needed before a regional assessment can be made, and therefore it has been categorised as Data Deficient.
evaluator: Snoeks, J., Tweddle, D., Getahun, A., Lalèyè, P., Paugy, D., Zaiss, R., Fishar, M.R.A & Brooks, E.
